<!-- Performance API Polyfills -->
<script>
  (function () {
    var noop = function noop() {};
    if ("performance" in window === false) {
      window.performance = {};
    }
    window.performance.mark = performance.mark || noop;
    window.performance.measure = performance.measure || noop;
    if ("now" in window.performance === false) {
      var nowOffset = Date.now();
      if (performance.timing && performance.timing.navigationStart) {
        nowOffset = performance.timing.navigationStart;
      }
      window.performance.now = function now() {
        return Date.now() - nowOffset;
      };
    }
  })();
  </script>
<!-- Globals Definitions -->
<script>
    (function () {
      var now = Date.now()
      window.initialTimestamps = {
        initialTimestamp: now,
        initialRequestTimestamp: Math.round(performance.timeOrigin ? performance.timeOrigin : now - performance.now())
      }

      window.thunderboltTag = "libs-releases-GA-local"
      window.thunderboltVersion = "1.10338.0"
    })();
  </script>

<script>

<!-- Polyfills check -->
<script>
    if (
      typeof Promise === 'undefined' ||
      typeof Set === 'undefined' ||
      typeof Object.assign === 'undefined' ||
      typeof Array.from === 'undefined' ||
      typeof Symbol === 'undefined'
    ) {
      // send bi in order to detect the browsers in which polyfills are not working
      window.fedops.phaseStarted('missing_polyfills')
    }
  </script>

<script>
    window.viewerModel = JSON.parse(document.getElementById('wix-viewer-model').textContent)
    window.fetchDynamicModel = fetch(window.viewerModel.dynamicModelUrl, { credentials: 'same-origin' }).then(function(r){return r.ok ? r.json() : "[" + r.status + "] " + r.statusText}).catch(function(e){ return e.message; });

<script type="text/javascript">
    var bodyCacheable = true;
    
    var exclusionReason = {"shouldRender":true,"forced":false};
    var ssrInfo = {"renderBodyTime":614,"renderTimeStamp":1655750671629}

<!--pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart start-->
<script id="pageHtmlEmbeds.bodyStart start" type="wix/htmlEmbeds"></script>

<script id="wix-first-paint">
    if (window.ResizeObserver &&
        (!window.PerformanceObserver || !PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes || PerformanceObserver.supportedEntryTypes.indexOf('paint') === -1)) {
        new ResizeObserver(function (entries, observer) {
            entries.some(function (entry) {
                var contentRect = entry.contentRect;
                if (contentRect.width > 0 && contentRect.height > 0) {
                    requestAnimationFrame(function (now) {
                        window.wixFirstPaint = now;
                        dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('wixFirstPaint'));
                    });
                    observer.disconnect();
                    return true;
                }
            });
        }).observe(document.body);
    }
</script>

id="SITE_HEADER-placeholder"></div><main id="PAGES_CONTAINER" tabindex="-1"><div id="SITE_PAGES"><div class="Ry26q" id="plcju"><div class="_3CemL" data-testid="page-bg"></div><div class="_3K7uv"><div class="_1KV2M" id="Containerplcju"><div class="" data-mesh-id="ContainerplcjuinlineContent" data-testid="inline-content"><div data-mesh-id="ContainerplcjuinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div aria-label="Anchor 1" class="qhwIj ignore-focus" id="comp-klg8jzyk" role="region" tabindex="-1"> </div><section class="_3d64y" id="comp-klg8jzyx"><div class="_3wnIc" data-hook="bgLayers" id="bgLayers_comp-klg8jzyx"><div class="_3KzuS _3SQN-" data-testid="colorUnderlay"></div><div class="_2GUhU" id="bgMedia_comp-klg8jzyx"></div></div><div class="_1uldx" data-testid="columns"><div class="_1vNJf" id="comp-klg8jzzx"><div class="_3wnIc" data-hook="bgLayers" id="bgLayers_comp-klg8jzzx"><div class="_3KzuS _3SQN-" data-testid="colorUnderlay"></div><div class="_2GUhU" id="bgMedia_comp-klg8jzzx"></div></div><div class="" data-mesh-id="comp-klg8jzzxinlineContent" data-testid="inline-content"><div data-mesh-id="comp-klg8jzzxinlineContent-gridContainer" data-testid="mesh-container-content"><div class="_1Q9if" data-testid="richTextElement" id="comp-klg8k000"><h1 class="font_0" style="font-size:36px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:36px;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Privacy Policy</span></span></span></span></span></h1></div><div class="_1Q9if" data-testid="richTextElement" id="comp-klg8k0081"><p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Who Are We?</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
The  websites at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://www.scalefocus.com/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://inside.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://inside.scalefocus.com</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://careers.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://careers.scalefocus.com</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://scalefocus.academy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://scalefocus.academy/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://virusafe.info/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://virusafe.info/,</a></span> <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://soundvision-project.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://soundvision-project.com/</a></span> and <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://itbeards.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://itbeards.scalefocus.com</a></span> (the ‘Websites”) are owned and maintained by SCALE FOCUS AD a joint stock company, having its business seat and registered address at <span style="font-family:wfont_000751_dde043c9cc214f9bbc15a2e74a9d960b,wf_dde043c9cc214f9bbc15a2e74,orig_montserrat_regular;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:0.03em;"><span style="color:#000000;">69</span></span></span></span><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_dde043c9cc214f9bbc15a2e74a9d960b,wf_dde043c9cc214f9bbc15a2e74,orig_montserrat_regular;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="letter-spacing:0.03em;"><span style="color:#000000;"> Bulgaria Blvd., Infinity Tower B, fl. 8 1404 Sofia, Bulgaria</span></span></span></span>, registered in the Commercial register of the Registry Agency under UIC 201996987. To the extend SCALE FOCUS AD may collect or process personal data through its Websites, SCALE FOCUS AD acts as the data controller for the processing of your personal data collected on the Websites.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">In this Privacy Policy, references to “we”, “us” or “our” means SCALE FOCUS AD and/or member firms that are part of SCALE FOCUS Group, as the case may be. References to “you” and “your” are to users of our Websites.<br/>
We recognize the importance of protecting your personal information and are committed to processing it responsibly and in compliance with applicable data protection laws in all countries in which we operate. Therefore we have created this Privacy Policy to inform you how we collect, use and otherwise handle information about you and any personal information you submit or make available to us, or that we collect from you, when you use our Websites and/or via email and/or via any events or social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, LinkedIn.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When using the term “personal information” or “Personal Information” we refer to information relating to you, which can be used to personally identify you (either directly or indirectly), such as your name, e-mail address, company name, address, phone number, CVs, resumes and other information about yourself or your business. Personal Information can also include information about you that is available on the internet, such as from Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and Google, or publicly available information that we acquire from service providers.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Only <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://www.scalefocus.com/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://inside.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://inside.scalefocus.com</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://careers.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://careers.scalefocus.com</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://scalefocus.academy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://scalefocus.academy/</a></span>, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://virusafe.info/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://virusafe.info/,</a></span> <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://soundvision-project.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://soundvision-project.com/</a></span> and <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://itbeards.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://itbeards.scalefocus.com</a></span> are within scope for this Privacy Policy.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:24px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Information About Children</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">The Websites are not intended for or targeted at children under 16 years old, and we do not knowingly or intentionally collect or maintain information about children under 16 years old. If you believe that we have collected information about a child under 16 years old, please contact us at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>, so that we may delete the information. In addition, we kindly ask any child under the age of 16 not to submit any personal information to us or use the Websites.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Why And How We Collect And Use Your Personal Information</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Types of personal information we collect</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">The types of information that we may collect from you, depending on how you use our Websites or contact us, include:</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your name;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your family name;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your email address;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your company details;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your CV, motivation letter or additional supporting documentation (portfolio, projects description, related pictures, etc.). you elect to provide, </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">    where you apply for a role at our company on our Websites or via email, events, social media sites or other sites;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>your photo if you elect to provide when you register for an Event;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>information about your age, gender, education, academic profile and occupation you elect to provide when you take part in our surveys </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">    (“Survey(s)”) and<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>any other information that you choose to provide us when filling out a contact form on our Websites or when attending our events,</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">    participating in our Surveys or by contacting us via e-mail or via any of the social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, LinkedIn.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">How do we collect information and how we use your Personal Information</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:24px; line-height:1.4em;"><br/>
<span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">Visitors to our Websites</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
When entering one of our Websites, we will collect information necessary for the operation of the Websites and for us to comply with security and legal requirements in relation to operating our Websites. We also collect information about your activities during your visit such as date and time of visits, the pages viewed, time spent at our Websites, and the websites visited just before our own, as well as your IP address and your browser so that we can better address your queries and to collect statistics to help us improve your browsing experience in the future.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Information from the “Contact Form” section of our Websites</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We may collect your Personal Information, which you choose to provide when you fill in contact forms on our Websites, including your name and e-mail. We may use this Personal Information to respond to your queries, and/or provide the services and/or information that you have requested.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Information from requests via e-mail</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When you contact us via e-mail in connection with a request such as request for information, to order a product or service, to provide you with support, to offer us a proposal or to participate in an event, we collect information necessary to respond to your request and to be able to contact you. For instance, we collect your name and contact information and details about your request. We may use this Personal Information to respond to your queries, and/or provide the services and/or information that you have requested.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We use Transport Layer Security (TLS) to encrypt and protect web and email traffic. If your email service does not support TLS, you should be aware that any emails we send or receive may not be protected in transit.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We will also monitor any emails sent to us, including file attachments, for viruses or malicious software. Please be aware that you have a responsibility to ensure that any email you send is within the bounds of the law.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Survey</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When you elect to particiate in Surveys, organized by us, you may provide to us personal information voluntarily and on your own initiative, as necessary for us to collect accurate feedback in relation to its employment or academic initiaiteves (such as the Scale Focus Pre-Academy Bootcamp).</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Events</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When you register for and/or participate in event, campaign, Survey, traineeship or other educational program („Training”) we may collect additional information (online or offline) in relation to the event, campaign, Survey or the Training organization, and during an event, campaign, Survey or a Training, such as participation in sessions, survey results, test results and/or results from exams. Events/compaigns may be recorded and group photos taken. We reserve the right to use photos for promotional use, unless you explicitly inform us that you don‘t want photos of you to be used for such purposes or request them to be removed. When you provide us with your business contact information (such as by handing over a business card) we may use this to communicate with you for business purposes only.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You can choose to receive information by email or telephone about our products and services or our open job positions (openings) by opting in through the instruments of the Website. You can always opt-out from receiving personalized communication for products and services by sending an e-mail to <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:marketing@scalefocus.com" target="_self">marketing@scalefocus.com</a></span> and copy to <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span> and for job openings to <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:careers@scalefocus.com" target="_self">careers@scalefocus.com</a></span> and copy to <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Newsletter subscription</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">If you choose to subscribe to our blog(s) and/or news in order to receive notifications for new articles, news and information about us (“Newsletter”), we will collect and use Personal Information that you provide during the subscription process to send you notifications for new articles and articles` content by email.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Your consent to the use of your Personal Information for these purposes is optional. If you decide not to subscribe to our Newsletter to receive new articles, news and information, we will not send you any Newsletters, but your use of our Websites will remain otherwise unaffected.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You are entitled to opt-out from receipt of Newsletters at any time. You can do so by using the “unsubscribe” option included in all e-mails. When you unsubscribe we will keep a record of this, and once your request has been processed, you will stop receiving emails for new articles. You can still use our Websites once you have unsubscribed.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">Recruitment</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">In connection with a job application,inquiry, registration for and/or participation in a Тraining, whether advertised on our Websites or otherwise (on LinkedIn, <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.jobs.bg/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">www.jobs.bg</a></span>, our Facebook page etc.), you may provide us with Personal Information about yourself, including your name, family name, e-mail, CV, motivation letter or additional supporting documentation (portfolio, projects description, related pictures, etc.) you elect to provide, where you apply for a role at our company on our Websites or via email, social media sites or other sites as well as any other information that you choose to provide to us when filling out a contact form on our Websites or when attending our events or by contacting us via e-mail or via any of the social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, Messenger, LinkedIn or any other site. We may use this information throughout our departments in order to address your inquiry or consider you for employment purposes. All of the information you provide during the process will only be used for the purpose of recruiting for the relevant currently vacant position that you have applied for and shall be kept for a period of no more than 6 months. If you have explicitly consented – your information will be also used for the purpose of recruiting of personnel for future vacant positions for a period of 2 years, which positions according to us are appropriate for you in view of your education, professional qualification and experience. If we enter into an employment relation with you, the submitted information will be stored for the purpose of processing the employment relationship in compliance with legal requirements. We may also use the information you provide during the recruitment process to fulfil other legal or regulatory requirements, if necessary. In addition you may elect for the purposes of the recruitment, to voluntarily provide in your CV Personal Information with a volume greater than the statutory minimum for the conclusion of an employment contract and in such case please be informed that the provision of data beyond than statutory minimum is not mandatory and that the non-provision of these data on your behalf has no negative impact on the selection process. Since you provide your Personal Information voluntarily on the grounds of a consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time by sending an email to: <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:careers@scalefocus.com" target="_self">careers@scalefocus.com</a></span> and copy to <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>. (please see below in section YOUR RIGHTS AS A DATA SUBJECT more information about your rights as a data subject). We will not share any of the information you provide during the recruitment process with any third parties for marketing purposes or store any of your information outside of the European Economic Area. The information you provide will be held securely by us and/or our data processors whether the information is in electronic or physical format.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We may also obtain information about job applicants from other sources, to the extent permitted by applicable law, such as through your contact with us, including your interactions with us, or from third parties such as employment agencies and other websites on the Internet. For example, you may choose to provide us with access to certain personal data stored by third parties such as social media sites like LinkedIn. By authorizing us to have access to this information, you agree we may collect, store and use this information in accordance with this Policy.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:24px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">People who contact us via social media</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We may also collect information posted by you on social media sites if have opted to connect to or otherwise link us with social media accounts including Facebook and Twitter or if you send us a private or direct message via social media. It will not be shared with any other organisations.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:24px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">Our Business Purposes</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
<span style="font-family:wfont_000751_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42e97d1e1,wf_ae785b7c779c4732bc0037e42,orig_montserrat_semibold;">We may also use your Personal Information for our business purposes such as:</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>record keeping, statistical analysis, internal reporting and research purposes;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to ensure network and information security;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to notify you about changes to our services;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to investigate any complaint you make;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to provide evidence in any dispute or anticipated dispute between you and us;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to customise various aspects of our Websites to improve your experience;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to host, maintain and otherwise support the operation of our Websites;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for the detection and prevention of fraud and other criminal offences and for for risk management purposes;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for business and disaster recovery (e.g. to create back-ups);<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for document retention/storage;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for database management;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to protect our rights, property, and/or safety, our personnel and others; and<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to ensure the quality of the services we provide to our users.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
<span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;">Use of third party services and Cookies</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
We collect the information relating to your use of our Websites through the use of various technologies.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When someone visits one of our Websites we use our own as well as third party services and technologies to collect standard internet log information and details of visitor behaviour patterns. We do this to find out things such as the number of visitors to the various parts of the Websites. This information is only processed in a way which does not identify anyone.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Our Websites utilizes a standard technology called ‘cookies’ and server logs to collect information about how our Website is used and to remember your preferences. Information gathered through cookies and server logs may include the date and time of visits, the pages viewed, time spent at our Websites, and the websites visited just before our own, as well as your IP address and browser.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">A cookie is a small text file that a website saves on your computer or mobile device when you visit the site. It enables the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size and other display preferences) over a period of time, so you don’t have to keep re-entering them whenever you come back to our Websites or browse from one page to another.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We also use the third party service Google Analytics – a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. We do not make, and do not allow Google to make, any attempt to find out the identities of those visiting our Websites. Google Analytics uses cookies to help us analyze how visitors use our Websites. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the Websites includes your IP address and will be transmitted to and stored by Google, on its servers. Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the Websites, creating reports on website activity and providing other services relating to Internet usage. Google may also pass this information on to third parties when required to do so by law, or when such third parties process the information on Google’s behalf. By using our Websites, you consent to the processing of data about your visit by Google in the manner and for the purposes set out above. If you so choose, you can opt out by turning off cookies in the preferences settings in your browser, or by downloading and installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on from <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout</a></span>. However, please note that you may not then be able to make full use of all the Websites’ functions.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You can read more about how we use cookies in our:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://www.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://inside.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://inside.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://careers.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://careers.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://scalefocus.academy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://scalefocus.academy/</a></span>,<br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://virusafe.info/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://virusafe.info/</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://soundvision-project.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://soundvision-project.com/</a></span><br/>
Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://itbeards.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">itbeards.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
 </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">MailChimp is our email service provider. To deliver this service MailChimp processes the email addresses of visitors to our Websites that have subscribed to our Newsletter. We use it to share our experience with overcoming challenges in the software engineering and IT sourcing business. We do send newsletters periodically to you if you have subscribed to our Newsletter. You can read the MailChimp Privacy Policy here: <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://mailchimp.com/legal/privacy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://mailchimp.com/legal/privacy/</a></span>.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We use a third party service to help maintain the security and performance of our Websites. To deliver this service it processes the IP addresses of visitors to our Websites.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">In addition, we may use your Personal Information for further specific purposes made clear at the point of collection on particular pages of our Websites.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">If you choose not to provide Personal Information requested by us, we may not be able to provide you with the information and/or services you have requested or otherwise fulfil the purpose(s) for which we have asked for the Personal Information. Aside from this, your visit to our Websites will remain unaffected.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Legal basis for collection and use of Personal Information</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
We process your Personal Information in relation to your subscription to event, participation in a Survey, a Training, our Newsletter, your use of the contact forms in our Websites and in cases for recruitment purposes, where we have your consent to do so. In other cases, we process your personal information where we need to do so:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>to comply with our legal and regulatory obligations;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for our legitimate interests and not overridden by your data protection interests or fundamental rights and freedoms in:<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">        •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>responding to your queries;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">        •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>providing services and/or information to you; and<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">        •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>our internal business purposes, as set out in section 2.8 above.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
You can object to processing based on our legitimate interests at any time by contacting us at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>. See also in section YOUR RIGHTS AS A DATA SUBJECT “<span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://cms.law/en/aut/footer-configuration/privacy-policy#yourrights" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">The right to object</a></span>”.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">If you would like to find out more about the legal basis on which we process your Personal Information for a particular purpose you can contact us at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Retention Of Personal Information</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">It is our policy to retain your Personal Information for the length of time required for the specific purpose or purposes for which it was collected. However, we may be obliged to store some Personal Information for a longer time, taking into account factors including:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>legal obligation(s) under applicable law to retain data for a certain period of time;<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>statute of limitations under applicable law(s);<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>(potential) disputes and<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>guidelines issued by relevant data protection authorities.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
Whilst we continue to process your Personal Information, we will ensure that it is treated in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Otherwise, we securely erase your information once this is no longer needed.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We have strict data retention periods determined in our Internal rules for personal data protection. If you would like to find out how long we keep your Personal Information for a particular purpose you can contact us at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="mailto:dpo@scalefocus.com" target="_self">dpo@scalefocus.com</a></span>.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">For more information on how long cookies are stored, please refer to our:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://www.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://inside.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://inside.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://careers.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://careers.scalefocus.com</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://sapservices.scalefocus.com/</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://scalefocus.academy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://scalefocus.academy/</a></span>,<br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://virusafe.info/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://virusafe.info/</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://soundvision-project.com/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://soundvision-project.com/</a></span><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>Cookie Policy for <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://itbeards.scalefocus.com" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">itbeards.scalefocus.com</a></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="text-decoration:underline;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">How And When Do We Share Information With Third Parties?</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
Some services that we provide require the involvement of third parties. We have carefully selected these third parties and taken steps to ensure that your Personal Information is adequately protected. Details about how we share Personal Information with third parties is set out below:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Google Analytics</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
Our Websites use Google Analytics, a web analysis service provided by Google Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics works using cookies.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Google Analytics cookies collect your IP address. We use the information collected by Google Analytics cookies to find out about how visitors use our Websites.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">The IP address sent by your browser in connection with Google Analytics will not be combined by Google, with other data.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">If you so choose, you can opt out by turning off cookies in the preferences settings in your browser, or by downloading and installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on from <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout</a></span>. However, please note that you may not then be able to make full use of all the Websites’ functions.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">MailChimp</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
We share your Personal Information with MailChimp if you have subscribed to our Newsletter. MailChimp is our email service provider. To deliver this service MailChimp processes the email addresses that you have provided by subscribing to our Newsletter. You can read the MailChimp Privacy Policy here: <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://mailchimp.com/legal/privacy/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://mailchimp.com/legal/privacy/</a></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">When we would like to use your Personal Information for a new purpose, we will let you know about this first.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Third party service providers</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
We also share your Personal Information with our third party service providers based in the European Economic Area (“EEA”) who we engage to provide support services in relation to our Websites for the purposes of: hosting and maintaining our Websites; providing data storage; assisting us with database management, and in order to assist us with related tasks or processes.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We may also share your Personal Information with any other third party if we are under a duty to disclose or share your Personal Information in order to comply with any legal obligation, or to protect the rights, property and/or safety of SCALE FOCUS Group, our personnel or others; or with any other third party for the purposes of acting in accordance with the requirements of a court, regulator or government agency, for example, complying with a search warrant or court order or acting in accordance with an applicable law or regulation.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Sharing buttons</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
Our Websites provide sharing buttons that you can click on in order to share content from our Websites on social media channels, e.g., Facebook. We do not use these buttons to share your Personal Information with social media providers. When you click on a sharing button the relevant social media provider will gather Personal Information directly from you. Please read the privacy notice of any social media provider with which you intend to share content before clicking on the corresponding sharing button.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;">Acquisition</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">If we (or our assets) are acquired by another company, whether by merger, acquisition, bankruptcy or otherwise, that company would receive all information gathered by us on the Websites. In this event, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on our Websites, of any change in ownership, uses of your Personal Information, and choices you may have regarding your Personal Information.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">International Transfers</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"> </p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">Some of the third parties described in this privacy policy, which provide services to us, may be based in other countries outside the European Economic Area (“EEA”). In case we are required to undertake any transfer of personal information outside the EEA, we take all reasonable necessary steps to ensure that your personal information is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and an adequate level of protection is applied to it, in particular through the implementation the European Commission-approved standard contractual data protection clauses, binding corporate rules for transfers to data processors, or other appropriate legal mechanisms to safeguard the transfer.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">Your Rights As A Data Subject</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="font-size:28px; line-height:1.4em;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:28px;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">The following section explains your rights.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-size:24px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to be informed</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have the right to be provided with clear, transparent and easily understandable information about how we use your Personal Information and your rights. This is why we are providing you with the information in this Privacy Policy.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right of access</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have the right to obtain a copy of your Personal Information (if we are processing it), and other certain other information (similar to that provided in this Privacy Policy) about how it is used.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
This is so you are aware and can check that we are using your information in accordance with data protection law.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">We can refuse to provide information where to do so may reveal Personal Information about another person or would otherwise negatively impact another person’s rights.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to rectification</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You can ask us to take reasonable measures to correct your Personal Information if it is inaccurate or incomplete. E.g. if we have the wrong name or address for you.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to erasure</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">This is also known as ‘the right to be forgotten’ and, in simple terms, enables you to request the deletion or removal of your Personal Information where there’s no compelling reason for us to keep using it or its use is unlawful. This is not a general right to erasure; there are exceptions, e.g. where have legal obligation to keep your Personal Informaton or we need to use your Personal Information in defence of a legal claim.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to restrict processing</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have rights to ‘block’ or suppress further use of your Personal Information when we are assessing a request for rectification or as an alternative to erasure. When processing is restricted, we can still store your Personal Information, but may not use it further. We keep lists of people who have asked for further use of their Personal Information to be ‘blocked’ to make sure the restriction is respected in future.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to data portability</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have rights to obtain and reuse certain Personal Information for your own purposes across different organisations.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to object</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have the right to object to certain types of processing, on grounds relating to your particular situation, at any time insofar as that processing takes place for the purposes of legitimate interests pursued by us or by a third party. We will be allowed to continue to process your Personal Information if we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing which override your interests, rights and freedoms or we need this for the establishment, exercise or defence of legal claims.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_000751_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b98500ab,wf_fe95ec4576e74628a598a168b,orig_montserrat_bold;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;">The right to complain to a data protection authority</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:22px;"><span style="color:#131313;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span style="font-weight:400;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa061e252,wf_e6d2573689294c5a9c75b34fa,orig_avenir_lt_std_95_black;"><span class="wixGuard">​</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;">You have the right to complain to a data protection authority about our collection and use of your Personal Information. Contact details for data protection authorities in the EEA, Switzerland and certain non-European countries (including the US and Canada) are available at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="http://ec.europa.eu/justice/article-29/structure/data-protection-authorities/index_en.htm" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">http://ec.europa.eu/justice/article-29/structure/data-protection-authorities/index_en.htm</a></span>.) Contact details of the Bulgarian data protection authority (CPDP) are available at <span style="text-decoration:underline;"><a href="https://www.cpdp.bg/en/index.php?p=pages&amp;aid=6" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">https://www.cpdp.bg/en/index.php?p=pages&amp;aid=6</a></span> and are as follows:</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><br/>
<span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for complaints in person – at the CPDP’s Registry at: 2 Prof. Tsvetan Lazarov Blvd., Sofia 1592 (see the location of CPDP).</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for complaints by post to: 2 Prof. Tsvetan Lazarov Blvd., Sofia 1592, Commission for Personal Data Protection.</p>
<p class="font_8" style="line-height:1.4em; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-size:18px;"><span style="font-family:wfont_d6efae_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c5e775b9,wf_79f36eb4f07b4012af3da736c,orig_avenir_lt_std_55_roman;"><span style="font-weight:normal;"><span style="font-style:normal;"><span><span style="color:rgb(19, 19, 19);">    •  </span></span></span></span></span></span>for complaints by fax: +3592/91-53-525.</p>
